page.title: 04HINDUS AND THEIR RELIGION
page.content: My name is Nidhi.I am a Hindu by religion.In Hindu language Nidhi means 'Treasure'.We have many Festivals. On Holi we put colours on each other,on Diwali we have fireworks.Sometimes we go to the Temple to pray to God to keep every_ body happy.We say thank yoy to God for giving us so many things,we put some pennies in the box,which is used for poor people. In the Temple there are statues of our different Gods,like Kali Ma,Krishna, Ram,Sita,Hanuman,Ggahesh and Shanker. They all look very beautiful to me. Sometimes we sing the Prayers in a group.The Priest gives us Basad also. I enjoy going to th Temple very much. .
